[Main Dimensions] - [Classes] - [Class_Marksman Marksman]

<br/>
*Description:*<br/>
The marksman knows when his shot will kill his target. The marksman uses this opportunity to very quickly fire another shot at a new target. This is a passive ability that is always in effect.
